main.name: Mingxing Wang
main.occupation: Full Stack Web Developer and a machine learning engineer
main.description: Proactive and passionate full stack web developer with over 10 years of experience. Eager to learn new technology and love to conquer new challenge
main.bio:
Majored in computer science and mathematics at university. Worked in Big 3 companies(Dalian ship building industry, CuddlyNest, Bitwage) as a full stack web developer.
 Mastered several algorithms and code challenges.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of information technology and mathematics
education.description: Majored at mathematics and information technology. I got bachelor's degree by presenting paper in limitness of new hidden Markov Chain. Mastered several mathematical fields and computer science.

work.title: Front End Web Developer(Internship)

work.title: Full-Stack Web Developer(remote)
work.description: Developed the cuddlynest app for Eastern Asian Hotels and maintain for over 6 months. Improve the landing speed and reduce the time to 50%.
work.main skills: Node.js, React, MongoDB, RestAPI, GIT, GraphQL, Apollo, Laravel

work.title: Full-Stack Web Developer(remote)
work.description: Developed the Bitwage admin app , client app and payment app for almost 2 years and maintain now. Use new latest framework to build the model with reusable component
work.main skills: React, Node.js, AWS, Serverless, ApiGateWay, S3, Python, Django

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer(remote, part time)

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer, Machine Learning Egineer
work.description: Developed many websites and entered Kaggle competition and improve the correctness and speed up the face recognition engine
work.main skills: Vue, Laravel, React, Angular, ML, Tensorflow, Keras...

testimonials.text: I was very happy while working with Mingxing. He is a kind, punctual and passionate guy. I love to work with him in the future
Mingxing, very team spirit. He works well with team with communication skills and clear understanding and instruction.
